overview: Pyar Hua Chori Chori is the story of a simple man, Vijay (Mithun Chakraborty), looking for quick money for his son's operation.  He finds himself an offer to act as a husband for a rich, wealthy girl (Gautami) for two weeks in return for his much-needed money.  The make-believe marriage finally ends up in love, but Vijay has a dark past, which would hurt every one.  Can he manage to survive?
title: Pyar Hua Chori Chori
